page.title: 04Methodist Chapel Prickwillow
page.content: Mr.Jakes told us that the Chapel is used most Sundays but there is no longer a Sunday School. The Service at quarter to three and is part of the { {Littleport Circuit}This means a Littleport Minister administers the Service. Some weeks it is a lay preacher. The Congregation{tends to be {elderly}with at least six attending. The Chapels in the Village take turns to celebrate particular Services. For instance one year the Carol Service for the Golden Link (over 60's Club) would be done by us then the Baptist Chapel would do it the next year. The Chapel is not normaly hired out for use and there is only an occasional week day meeting.{Children} can come with their parents and sometimes to help there is a morning service.
